• Elegant Rose Gold Plating

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
The banner is a modern square layout divided into four pastel-toned quadrants. The top-left quadrant features a bold brand name (`brand_name`), a sleek tagline (`tagline`), and a prominent product title (`heading`), all aligned to the left. Overlayed is a soft pink circular graphic for emphasis. The top-right section houses a centered product image (`product_image`) of rose gold wreath earrings, accentuated by minimal background details such as dotted lines and curves. The bottom-left portion lists product features (`description`) and pricing information (`price`) in a clear hierarchy. A call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) stands out in maroon, inviting immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Rose: `#FFF5F5`
- Dusty Pink: `#FFE2E7`
- Warm Pink: `#FFD6DE`
- Soft Blush: `#FFEAEF`
- Rose Accent: `#E87796`
- Maroon Text: `#C23555`
- Deep Wine: `#9E2B46`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings with a predominantly rose gold and crystal aesthetic. The main color palette includes soft rose pink (#F4A6A6), warm rose gold (#EBA9A8), bright silver-white (#FFFFFF), and clear crystal-like reflections (#D1D1D1). The rose gold forms the structural base, outlining the floral and petal design, while the crystals add dazzling brightness and contrast. The colors are blended with smooth metallic transitions and varying transparency in the gems, yet each hue stands out due to the sharp luster and material contrast. This palette evokes elegance and femininity, ideal for a luxurious and modern banner advertisement.
